scripts.deploy:local: npx hardhat compile && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network localhost
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: npx hardhat compile && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network rinkeby
scripts.deploy:kovan: npx hardhat compile && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network kovan
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:local && npm run deploy:rinkeby && npm run deploy:kovan
scripts.dev: concurrently "npx hardhat node" "wait-on http://localhost:8545/ && npm run deploy:local && npm run client"
